casebody.data:
GRAHAM
v.
NC DEPT. OF CORRECTION. No. 605P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2008. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for NC Dept. of Correction.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of December 2007 by Plaintiff for "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of March 2008."
